name: Drowning the adventure.
description: It all started one summer when I went out to play in my backyard. As it was a backyard with trees and ground for me it was as if it were a forest in which I did my explorations. I used to hang out playing or watching my brother play video games. One day my father told me to go to spend the day on the beach, at that time I was very careless and playing at the edge of the rocks I fell and hurt my leg preventing me from reach the surface, luckily my father could get me out, leaving me the memory of how I almost drowned at the beach.
